ExplanationOfBenefit.item.adjudication.reason

For any given service line, which we consider an item, there can be multiple payment explanation codes applied.
The spec allows for one reason.

We see that we can provide multiple adjudication denial reason codes, but there is nowhere to put multiple non-denial adjudication reason codes.

Please advise.
@Saul Kravitz Hi Saul - Any feedback on the ExplanationOfBenefit.item.adjudication.reason item? Thanks, John
@Pat Taylor @Amol Vyas
@John Achoukian Hi John, Are there industry standard code systems for the non-denial reasons? @Saul Kravitz @Amol Vyas

Aren't we using the CARC/RARC Codes? @Pat Taylor
edited my original comment
@Jason Teeple @John Achoukian CARIN uses CARC / RARC codes. The CARCs explain why a payment amount is different from the submitted charges. @Amol Vyas
